rule_types.description: Check the number of rows in the dataset
Checks the percentage match of the row count of the primary dataset against a reference dataset

parameters.name: ReferenceDatasetAlias
parameters.description: Alias of reference dataset

rule_types.description: Checks the number of columns in the dataset
Check the percentage of complete (non-null) values in a given column

parameters.name: TargetColumn

parameters.description: Name of column to check completeness of

parameters.name: TargetColumn
parameters.description: Name of column to check data type of

rule_types.description: Checks if the names of the columns in the dataset match a given pattern

parameters.name: PatternToMatch
parameters.description: Pattern to match against the names of the columns

rule_types.description: Check the existence of a given column

parameters.name: TargetColumn
parameters.description: Name of column to check existence of

rule_types.description: Check the correlation between two given columns

parameters.name: TargetColumn1
parameters.description: Name of first column

parameters.name: TargetColumn2
parameters.description: Name of second column

parameters.name: TargetColumn
parameters.description: Name of column to check uniqueness of

parameters.description: Name of column to check uniqueness of

parameters.description: Name of column to check sum of

parameters.description: Name of column to check standard deviation of

parameters.description: Name of column to check entropy of

parameters.name: TargetColumn
parameters.description: Name of column to check distinct values count of

parameters.name: TargetColumn
parameters.description: Name of column to check unique value ratio of

rule_types.description: Check the length of values of a given column

parameters.name: TargetColumn
parameters.description: Name of column to check the length of the values of

rule_types.description: Check if a given column contains a primary key, by checking for uniqueness and completeness

parameters.name: TargetColumn
parameters.description: Name of column(s) to check if it is (they are) unique and complete

rule_types.description: Returns the column values of a given column

parameters.name: TargetColumn
parameters.description: Name of column to return the values of

rule_types.description: Check the freshness of a date column

parameters.name: TargetColumn
parameters.description: Name of column to check the freshness of

rule_types.description: Runs a custom SQL against the dataset and returns a single value

parameters.name: CustomSqlStatement
parameters.description: Custom SQL statement to run against the dataset

rule_types.description: Check the referential integrity of given columns against a reference dataset

parameters.name: PrimaryDatasetColumns
parameters.description: Names of columns from primary dataset separated by commas

parameters.name: ReferenceDatasetColumns
parameters.description: Alias of reference dataset and comma separated names of columns from reference dataset. The alias and the names should be separated by a period. The names should be enclosed in curly brackets.

rule_types.description: Check the percentage of records in the primary dataset that are equal to records in the reference dataset by joining the datasets using a primary/composite key

parameters.name: ReferenceDatasetAlias
parameters.description: Alias of reference dataset

parameters.name: KeyColumnMappings
parameters.description: Mappings of key columns used for joining the two datasets

rule_types.description: Check the percentage of records in the primary dataset that are equal to records in the reference dataset by joining the datasets using a primary/composite key

parameters.name: ReferenceDatasetAlias
parameters.description: Alias of reference dataset

parameters.name: KeyColumnMappings
parameters.description: Mappings of key columns used for joining the two datasets

parameters.name: MatchColumnMappings
parameters.description: Mappings of columns used for matching

rule_types.description: Checks the percentage match of the schema of the primary dataset against a reference dataset

parameters.name: ReferenceDatasetAlias
parameters.description: Alias of reference dataset

rule_types.description: Checks the percentage match of two aggregate expressions

parameters.name: AggregateExpression1
parameters.description: The first aggregate expression

parameters.name: AggregateExpression2
parameters.description: The second aggregate expression

rule_types.description: Checks if the current value of the metric is anomalous with respect to the historical values

parameters.name: MetricParameter
parameters.description: The parameters required to evaluate the metric. The first parameter must be the metric name.

rule_types.description: Monitor Only. Produces a collection of statistics.

parameters.name: TargetColumn
parameters.description: Name of the column to analyze
